data.title: Radio personality to speak at Tea Party forum
images: https://www.hendersonvillelightning.com/images/adbanners/2024 RB Lightning Web Ads 300 x 250 px.png
data.meta_description: Hendersonville, NC - The fastest name in news. Local News, Sports, Politics, Weather, etc.
data.text:
SKYLAND â€” J.D. Hayworth, radio and television personality and former Arizona congressman, is scheduled to speak during the Asheville Tea PAC's non-partisan forum on Saturday, at the Skyland Fire Department. He is scheduled to arrive at noon.

The event is free.

Hayworth was elected to Congress during the Republican Revolution in 1994 and served until 2007.
